jp_text: マヨネーズ？

en_text: Um, what are you trying to say,\NDeputy-Captain?
jp_text: あの　副長は何と言いたいので
google_translated: That's what you want to say

en_text: I want to support the captain!
jp_text: 艦長の支えになりたい
google_translated: I want to be supported by the captain

en_text: In exchange, I'll try to do...
jp_text: その代わり　他のことは私が…

en_text: No, everyone on the Harekaze\Nwill do the rest somehow!
jp_text: いや　晴風のみんなが何とかする

en_text: I'm not the only one thinking that.
jp_text: そう思っているのは　私だけじゃない
google_translated: I'm not only me who think so

en_text: That's right! We can do more, too!
jp_text: そうだよ　私たちもっとやれるよ
google_translated: That's right I can do more

en_text: I-I'm not going to just run away all the time.
jp_text: わ…私だって　もう逃げてばかりじゃありません
google_translated: Wow ... I'm not just running away

en_text: I can do it!
jp_text: なんだってできます

en_text: Where there's a will, there's a way.
jp_text: 為せば成る
google_translated: Where there is will, there is a way

en_text: If the Deputy-Captain is mayonnaise,\NI'll be mustard!
jp_text: 副長がマヨネーズなら　私はマスタードになります
google_translated: If the deputy length is Mayonnaise, I will be Mustard

en_text: There is no storm that comrades of the sea\Ncan't overcome, right?
jp_text: 海の仲間に　越えられない嵐はないんでしょう
google_translated: There is no storm that can not be beyond the sea

en_text: Shiro... Everyone...
jp_text: シロちゃん…　みんな…

en_text: Signal with lights from the Musashi!
jp_text: 武蔵より発光信号　読み上げます
google_translated: I read the emission signal from Musashi

en_text: Approaching is dangerous.
jp_text: 接近は危険

en_text: "Mo-e-ka."
jp_text: もえか

en_text: Moka is safe!
jp_text: もかちゃん無事だったんだ

en_text: Isoroku.
jp_text: 五十六　ありがとう

en_text: Combat...
jp_text: 戦闘

en_text: ...port cannons and torpedoes together.
jp_text: 左　砲雷　同時戦

en_text: The Musashi at 300 degrees!
jp_text: 300度の武蔵

en_text: The target, compass bearing 30 degrees,\Nspeed 18 knots!
jp_text: 目標　敵進30度　敵速18ノット
google_translated: Target enemy promotion 30 degree enemy speed 18 knots

en_text: Fifth combat speed, 340 degrees,\Nsteady as she goes!
jp_text: 第五戦速　340度ヨーソロー

en_text: Captain. The Harekaze is sending\Na flashing light signal!
jp_text: 艦長　晴風から発光信号です
google_translated: It is a light emission signal from the captain

en_text: - Read it.\N- Yes.
jp_text: 読み上げて

en_text: I repeat, we're coming to rescue your ship."
jp_text: 繰り返す　我貴艦の救出に向かう
